column2: "Okay, I understand. <%me>, looks like we go straight from here."
"Were you talking with them just now? I have no idea what they're trying to say."
"Hahaha, of course! I don't understand all of it, though."
"I won't say that I can \"feel\" what they say, but I'm picking it up slowly."
"\"Here\" or \"there\"...for now, it's nice just being able to convey that much."
"Alright, let's go. These guys get antsy if they stay in one place for too long."
"第５章 砂に隠されたもの"
